code: var log=console.log;export var avgWeight=function avgWeight(allUser){var weekAvg=[];var count=0;for(var i=0;i<7;i++){var sum=0;for(var x in allUser){if(allUser[x].type==='user'){sum=sum+allUser[x].trends.weight[i];count=count+1;}}if(count!==0){weekAvg.push(sum/count);}count=0;}log('average weight loaded');return weekAvg;};export var avgStress=function avgStress(allUser){var weekAvg=[];var count=0;for(var i=0;i<7;i++){var sum=0;for(var x in allUser){if(allUser[x].type==='user'){sum=sum+allUser[x].trends.stress[i];count=count+1;}}if(count!==0){weekAvg.push(sum/count);}count=0;}log('average stress  loaded');return weekAvg;};export var avgSleep=function avgSleep(allUser){var weekAvg=[];var count=0;for(var i=0;i<7;i++){var sum=0;for(var x in allUser){if(allUser[x].type==='user'){sum=sum+allUser[x].trends.sleep[i];count=count+1;}}if(count!==0){weekAvg.push(sum/count);}count=0;}log('average sleep loaded');return weekAvg;};export var avgCalories=function avgCalories(allUser){var weekAvg=[];var count=0;for(var i=0;i<7;i++){var sum=0;for(var x in allUser){if(allUser[x].type==='user'){sum=sum+allUser[x].trends.calories[i];count=count+1;}}if(count!==0){weekAvg.push(sum/count);}count=0;}log('average calories loaded');return weekAvg;};
